author: Simon Difford
description: Bitter orange peel is a botanical which features in many gins, and in this cocktail a bitter sweet bergamot liqueur is mixed with gin to good effect.
name: Gin & IT (Rosolio recipe)
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
